entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is trying to apparate.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who falls flat on his back during the apparition attempt.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who does a pirouetting leap into his hoop but is ridiculed by Dean Thomas.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who roars with laughter at Ernie Macmillan's attempt to apparate.

entities.name: t wycross
entities.description: The teacher in charge of the apparition lesson, who seems unimpressed by the students' attempts.

relationships.description: Harry and Neville both lost their balance during the apparition attempt.
Ernie Macmillan was ridiculed by Dean Thomas for his pirouetting leap into his hoop.
T Wycross told Harry to adjust his hoop and return to his original position.
